p: The EO-loaded films can also be produced by film extrusion method. However, the method is used for developing films using resins. The process can be used to produce single or multilayer films depending on the type of the extruder used. The produce films have been used to make bags or liner or covers which can preserve foods [ 65]. Since the current review is on the EO- and polysaccharide-based edible films and coatings, this method is out of the scope of the review.
